value.title: India FinTech Forum Selects 27 Fintech Startups for IFTA 2020
value.excerpt: Non-profit fintech advocacy group India FinTech Forum announced on Tuesday the list of 27 fintech startups shortlisted for the 5 th edition of India Fintech Awards (IFTA). The startups will be giving live demos to the jury from 30 November till 2 December 2020 to compete for the Fintech Startup of the Year at the award ceremony.
